statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 8 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -12 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 4 \\ 5 \\ 28 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
